fdm.title: Master FDM 3D Printing
fdm.description: Learn the fundamentals and advanced techniques of FDM 3D printing. From basic setup to complex multi-material printing, become proficient in the most widely used 3D printing technology.

handsOn.title: Hands-on Experience
handsOn.description: Work with professional FDM printers and learn through practical projects

expert.title: Expert Instruction
expert.description: Learn from certified professionals with years of industry experience

certification.title: Certification
certification.description: Receive an industry-recognized certificate upon completion

sla.title: Master SLA 3D Printing
sla.description: Discover the world of high-precision SLA 3D printing. Learn to create detailed, smooth-surface prints for professional applications and rapid prototyping.

handsOn.title: Hands-on Experience
handsOn.description: Work with industrial-grade SLA printers and learn through practical projects

expert.title: Expert Instruction
expert.description: Learn from certified professionals with years of industry experience

certification.title: Certification
certification.description: Receive an industry-recognized certificate upon completion

precision.title: Master Precision Manufacturing
precision.description: Learn the art of precision manufacturing with modern tools and techniques. From CNC machining to advanced finishing processes, master the skills needed for high-quality production.

handsOn.title: Hands-on Experience
handsOn.description: Work with professional manufacturing equipment and learn through practical projects

expert.title: Expert Instruction
expert.description: Learn from certified professionals with years of industry experience

certification.title: Certification
certification.description: Receive an industry-recognized certificate upon completion

cad.title: Master CAD Design with Fusion360
cad.description: Become proficient in CAD design using Autodesk Fusion360. Learn to create complex 3D models, assemblies, and prepare designs for manufacturing.

handsOn.title: Hands-on Experience
handsOn.description: Work on real-world projects using Fusion360 software

expert.title: Expert Instruction
expert.description: Learn from certified professionals with years of industry experience

certification.title: Certification
certification.description: Receive an industry-recognized certificate upon completion

digitalFabrication.title: Digital Fabrication Workshop
digitalFabrication.description: Explore the intersection of digital design and physical manufacturing in this intensive workshop.

skills.skill1: UV printer setup, operation, and material compatibility
skills.skill2: Vinyl cutter operation and design preparation
skills.skill3: Print quality optimization and color management
skills.skill4: Vector graphics creation and cut path optimization

scanning.title: 3D Scanning Workshop
scanning.description: Learn to capture real-world objects and convert them into digital 3D models using advanced scanning technology.
